metadata.name: Key
metadata.description:
Key

Every Datastore record has an identifying key, which includes the record’s entity kind and a unique identifier. The identifier may be either a key name string, assigned explicitly by the application, or an integer numeric ID, assigned automatically by Datastore.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new "my-todo-project",
                    "/path/to/keyfile.json"

dataset = gcloud.datastore
entity = dataset.find "User", "heidi@example.com"
entity.key.dataset_id #=> "my-todo-project"

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new "my-todo-project",
                    "/path/to/keyfile.json"

dataset = gcloud.datastore
entity = dataset.find "User", "heidi@example.com"
entity.key.dataset_id #=> "my-todo-project"

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new "my-todo-project",
                    "/path/to/keyfile.json"

dataset = gcloud.datastore
entity = dataset.find "User", "heidi@example.com"
entity.key.namespace #=> "ns~todo-project"

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new "my-todo-project",
                    "/path/to/keyfile.json"

dataset = gcloud.datastore
entity = dataset.find "User", "heidi@example.com"
entity.key.namespace #=> "ns~todo-project"

params.name: kind
params.description: The kind of the Key. This is optional.

params.name: id_or_name
params.description:
The id or name of the Key. This is
optional.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
dataset = gcloud.datastore

user = dataset.find "User", "heidi@example.com"
query = dataset.query("List").
  ancestor(user.key)
lists = dataset.run query
lists.first.key.parent #=> Key("User", "heidi@example.com")

metadata.name: path
metadata.description: Represent the Key’s path (including parent) as an array of arrays. Each inner array contains two values, the kind and the id or name. If neither an id or name exist then nil will be returned.

metadata.name: complete?
metadata.description:
Determine if the key is complete. A complete key has either an id or a name.

Inverse of #incomplete?

metadata.name: incomplete?
metadata.description:
Determine if the key is incomplete. An incomplete key has neither an id nor a name.

Inverse of #complete?
